issue.title: [CF 276] Reactive ability icon
issue.body:
If player is DeathKnight, the checkbox of "Ignore lack of power" can't tick. "Ignore runes" can't tick before "cooldown check" is ticked.


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl | Imported from CurseForge issue #276 | Raw

comments.body:
Attachment Added: tmw-reactive.JPG

tmw-reactive.JPG


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl

Ignore runes isnt supposed to be checkable unless cooldown check is checked, but the fact that ignore runes and ignore lack of power are on top of eachother is indeed a bug. Im out of space in the icon editor, though...


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
